body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CleanStays! My name is Joe Miller. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Joan! How are you doing today?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's wonderful to hear! To assist you better, could you please provide me with your room number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm staying in room two zero four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! And for security purposes, can you confirm the last four digits of the credit card used for booking your reservation?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The last four digits are eight seven six five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for verifying that, Joan. I appreciate your assistance. Is there anything specific you'd like to address today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I just wanted to compliment the cleanliness of my room.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Joan. Thank you for your kind words. If you have any more questions or need assistance, feel free to let me know. Thank you for your time today, Joan. Have a wonderful day!
